description: Selected as the sole talent in the Open Startup Tunisia (OST) pan‑African accelerator
Built a Flutter MVP with API integrations and end‑to‑end testing, cutting development time by 30%
Gained practical startup insights, focusing on user‑centered features and market validation
Led development of a secure admin platform with JWT authentication, group & session management
Automated password generation & email notifications using Nodemailer, reducing admin workload by 40%
Implemented frontend & backend with React and Express js, improving user experience and operational efficiency
